transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello yes sir
Executive: Good morning ma'am
Customer: Sir hello
Executive: Hello good morning good morning ma'am
Customer: Good morning sir, kaun si company se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Mai Arham Enterprise se bol raha tha.
Customer: Arham Enterprise se? Ji sir meri abhi toh baat hui hai aapse, bataiye.
Customer: Mai ye bol raha tha mai unse ye kar raha tha baat kar raha tha na toh woh
Customer: ek cheez bol rahe the ki aap aisa kijiye aisa mat kijiye kuch aur hi bata rahe the.
Customer: Kin ki baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Mai baat kar raha hu aapka agent ka baat kar raha hu mai jis agent se baat hoke mera jo subscription hua tha unke baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Achha toh unse aapne baad mein baat kari toh woh kya bol rahe hain abhi?
Customer: Woh baat kiya toh woh process bata rahe the ki aap aisa kijiye aisa kijiye kuch aur hi process bata rahe hain.
Executive: Kya process bata rahe hain aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Ki aap direct call kijiye aur baat kijiye unse.
Customer: Ki mujhe refund chahiye karke.
Executive: Nahi aap kisko call karne ke liye bol rahe hain woh?
Customer: Woh bol rahe the jo aapka helpline number hai na IndiaMART ka wohi pe call karne bol rahe the.
Executive: Sir usse kya hoga agar aap helpline pe bhi ye bhejoge request aap ek kaam karo sir.
Executive: Aap mujhe unka number ek baar bhej dijiye mai unse directly baat kar leti hu, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir, aapke paas mera WhatsApp number hai?
Customer: Hai.
Executive: Hai na aapke paas? Aapne mujhe message mere ko usme bhejo mai unse baat karke phir aapko call back karti hu, don't worry meri taraf se 110% support aapko milega.
Executive: Bilkul pareshan mat hoiye.
Customer: Mujhe mujhe bas kuch nahi chahiye mujhe mera refund chahiye aur maine uss subscription se kuch nahi kiya.
Executive: Sir mai sir dekhiye sir dekhiye mai usi ke mai usi ke regarding aapse keh rahi hu ki mai aapki puri help karungi but pehle aap mujhe number dijiye at least mai ek baar unse baat karu ki woh aapko ye wali cheeze kya bol rahe hain at least
Executive: mujhe bhi pata chale na kyunki maine aapko jaise ki bataya ki ek wrong commitment hai aur refund as such possible nahi hai but mai baat kar leti hu unhone aapse aisa kyun bola hai.
Executive: Toh jo bhi hoga hum jo bhi action lenge mai aapko zaroor update karungi, theek hai?
Customer: Nahi mujhe koi action se matlab nahi hai mujhe toh refund se matlab hai ma'am.
Executive: Sir refund ke liye jo bhi possible hoga hum zaroor uss pe dhyaan denge but aap pehle mujhe number bhejiye mai ek baar baat kar leti hu.
Customer: Mai bas isiliye mai baar baar ek baar unko ek baar aapko ye karne ki mujhe bhi dikkat ho rahi hai ye aap logo ko bhi dikkat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Sir aap mat kariye na mai aap sir aap aap bilkul mat kariye aap mujhe number bhej karke aur thoda sa wait kariye.
Customer: Jo chances the jo chances the woh bhi nahi rahe kya hua phir baad mein wohi.
Executive: Sir aisa sir aisa kyun hoga chances kis baat ke? Aapko kya lagta hai ki agar unhone aapse bol diya ki aap yaha par call kar lijiye toh usse refund ho jayega sir? Nahi hoga na?
Executive: Aapko thoda sa toh dekho trust uss pe dikhana hi padega sir, aapko mere ko number de dijiye mai ek baar baat kar leti hu phir aapko bata deti hu, theek hai usme jo bhi update hoga aapko call bhi karne ki need nahi hai mai aapko saamne se call kar lungi.
Customer: Achha theek hai mai ye aapka jo mai bol raha tha kal ka hamara conversation hua tha kal parso ka toh usme mai chats dhoond raha tha toh mujhe usme mila toh yaha pe ek message unhone delete kiya hua hai call me bolne ke baad usme kuch message kiya phir unhone delete kar diya phir maine ji bola phir unhone bola nahi hui shayad matlab ye subscription hai lekin 999 likha hua hai.
Executive: Koi baat nahi aap aap aap bilkul pareshan mat hoiye aap mujhe bas bhej dijiye number mai directly hi baat kar leti hu toh beech mein ye messages vagaira ki baat jayegi mai directly unko call kar leti hu ek baar, theek hai? Aap pareshan mat hoiye aap mujhe number bhejiye mai aapko saamne se call karke update karti hu sir.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am phir boss bhi daate ke bolenge maine nahi bola tha tum aage aage chal rahe the har cheez mein aage rehte the.
Executive: Sir kaun daatega sir aap customer ho aapko koi nahi daat sakta aapko ek cheez samajhni padegi aap customer ho sir.
Customer: Mai apna boss mai apna apna boss se baat kar raha hu mai unhone koi bhi cheez lene se pehle mere se matlab.
Executive: Achha aapke boss sir aapke meri baat suniye meri baat suniye aapke boss aapko kis cheez ke liye daatenge?
Customer: Woh bolenge.
Executive: Woh sir aap IndiaMART wale aap IndiaMART wale aap woh bhi IndiaMART mein employee hain mai bhi IndiaMART mein employee hu right? Aap kisi bahar wale ko kisi ka number nahi de rahe ho na aur balki aap nahi bhi dena chahte toh aap rehne dijiye aapne mujhe naam bata diya Rahul mai khud se ek baar aapka check karke mai unse khud hi connect kar leti hu aapko nahi bhi number dena koi dikkat nahi hai but jo bhi hai mujhe.
Customer: Nahi dene ka nahi hai mujhe number dene mein dikkat nahi hai mai ye mai ye soch raha hu ki bas koi issue create na ho jisse mujhe dikkat ho aur mera refund na mile.
Executive: Sir dekhiye meri baat suniye meri baat suniye sir issue ki baat aisi hai ki unhone jo bhi aapse commitment kare hain mujhe uske regarding unse ek baar discussion karna hi padega ki unhone aise jo aapse commitments kare hain woh kyun kare hain kyunki woh cheeze possible nahi hai sir.
Customer: Sir aapne bola aisa dusra face kiya hai aur bhi aisa aa rahe hain toh matlab aap kaafi logo ke face kiye honge.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi bol rahi hu but mai keh rahi hu uss tarike ki jo complaints hai jab woh teen mahine baad hamare saamne aati hai toh woh hamare liye bahut difficult ho jata hai kyunki hum uss pe kuch action nahi le paate agar initial starting mein hi client hume ye cheez bata de jaise aap mujhe bata dete toh usi samay uss par action ho sakta tha ya usi samay hum refund hona tha ya jo bhi hona tha woh usi samay ho jata.
Customer: Ha toh mai ye bol raha tha toh unke saath aisa hua na A to Z toh unke saath hi discussion hua phir aap assign hue phir unke saath jo subscription lene ke baad hi subscription hum liye tab unse ye baat hui ki aisa aisa uske baad jaake humne subscription liya aap toh baad mein.
Executive: Nahi mai mai isiliye mai isiliye hi sir aapse mai aapse khud yahi cheez toh bolne ki koshish kar rahi hu ki jab meri jaise initial phase mein aapse baat hui usi samay usi samay aapse mujhe ye pata chal jaaye ki sir Aahana ki sir ye wali jo sorry Arham Enterprises pe client ko aisa bola gaya hai right? Toh woh wali jo issue hai woh wohi par resolve ho jaaye ab teen unhone kyunki aapko teen mahine ka samay de diya toh aapne mujhe jab batai ye wali cheez woh teen mahine baad batai ki ma'am maine teen mahina wait kar liya mujhe business nahi mil raha ab aap refund de dijiye.
Customer: Right? Toh aap.
Customer: Warna mai pehle bata deta theek hai mujhe teen mahine ka time diya hai isiliye nahi hue.
Executive: Ha wohi mera point hai wohi mera point hai sir ki aap pehle hi bata dete koi baat nahi but theek hai ab jo hua aap mai ek baar unse baat karke phir aapko call back karti hu.
Customer: Mai aapko connect kar raha hu aur screenshot share karu ya rehne du?
Executive: Ha mujhe woh bhi dijiye sir.
Customer: Theek hai mai de deta hu aur
Customer: Aap jo bhi aapki taraf se ho raha hai mujhe bataiye.
Executive: Bilkul sir aapko update milega tension nahi lijiye.
Customer: Mujhe na ma'am 100% solution chahiye bas.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai ye maine aapko screenshot bhej diya aur mai contact bhi de dunga thank you so much.
Executive: Theek hai sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for subscription.

- Agent provided misleading information about refund.

- Worried about boss scolding for contacting IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to contact agent directly.

- Assured customer of full support.

- Requested the customer to share agent's number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share agent's number and screenshots.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, agent, misleading information
